alert.note: Alert for Bent; Las Animas; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:29PM MDT until June 16 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 929 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles south of Las Animas to Higbee to 12 miles south of Timpas, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Higbee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
